name: alisher-portfolio
description: Full-stack portfolio website for Alisher Namozov
author: Alisher Namozov

scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.backend:build: cd backend && npm install && npm run build || echo 'No backend build script'
scripts.frontend:build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
